summary: *Vogue* is a popular fashion magazine started in 1892 in the U.S. It shares style tips, fashion news, and interviews with famous people. The magazine has grown, with 28 international versions now, including British *Vogue* and *Vogue Italia*, which is considered the best fashion magazine. The U.S. edition, with its headquarters in New York City, is known for its big September issue, like the 900-page one in 2012 with Lady Gaga. These magazines are part of the Cond√© Nast group.
title: Vogue (magazine)
